## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's [coding standards](docs/ARCHITECTURE.md#coding-standards)
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have added type hints to all functions
- [ ] I have written docstrings for all public APIs

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] Test coverage has not decreased (or I've explained why)
- [ ] All tests are passing in CI

### Documentation
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG.md under "Unreleased" section
- [ ] I have updated relevant docstrings and code comments
- [ ] I have added/updated examples if applicable

### Dependencies
- [ ] I have updated requirements.txt/package.json if adding new dependencies
- [ ] All new dependencies are necessary and well-maintained
- [ ] I have verified no security vulnerabilities in new dependencies

### Breaking Changes
- [ ] This PR includes breaking changes (if yes, describe below)
- [ ] I have updated the migration guide (if applicable)
- [ ] I have bumped the version number appropriately
